unnormalised: Arre yaar, remember to keep your employee ID handy while claiming reimbursements. Also, update your Aadhar card details in the HR portal, especially if you've moved. My edu qualifications are linked to my driving license now, so just make sure everything matches your PAN card! Registration No. is IMP23456 and roll no is 2938475, so be careful when filling out forms.
normalised: Arre yaar, remember to keep your employee I-D handy while claiming reimbursements. Also, update your Aadhar card details in the H-R portal, especially if you've moved. My education qualifications are linked to my driving license now, so just make sure everything matches your P-A-N card! Registration Number is I-M-P two three four five six and roll number is two million nine hundred thirty eight thousand four hundred seventy five, so be careful when filling out forms.
